Posts.Content: Aug 25, 2010 12:16PM Suzmor wrote: Hi MarieKelly, Thanks for posting the Chemo information. I am currently researching the many, many side effects of chemo. I was diagnosed in June 2010, had mast. right breast, triple negative breast cancer was told by two onologists I need aggressive chemo. I am very concerned about the side effects. I am researching other alternatives, turmeric, blueberries, vit C IV therapy, etc. Thanks for sharing
Posts.Title: CHEMO BRAIN seen on MRI MarieKelly Suzmor
